dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Violation Notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 2004 4:21 PM
To: www.sveasoft.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] DMCA Copyright Violation Notice

Your email is being sent to our legal counsel for consideration.
--
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


www.sveasoft.com wrote:
> 
> Dear ThePlanet.com;
>  
> This email is to inform you of a DMCA copyright violation from the URL 
> http://www.ecamnetwork.com/wrt54g at IP address 69.56.161.42 on a server 
> owned or controlled by ThePlanet.com. Copies of our copyrighted software 
> are distributed from this URL without authroization by Sveasoft Inc. 
> Email requests to the WebDogPro domain owner using this address to 
> remove this material to the web site maintainer have not received any 
> response or action. We request that this URL and the offending material 
> be removed.
>  
> The material is copyright Sveasoft Incorporated.
>  
> The material consists of the following files available from the web site:
>  
> WRT54G.Sveasoft.Firmware.Alchemy.pre5.3_by_wrt54g.streamfire.net.zip
> WRT54G.Sveasoft.Firmware.Alchemy.pre5.3_by_wrt54g.streamfire.net.zip
> WRT54G_Wolf_W14_Alchemy_5_2_3_by_wrt54g.streamfire.net.zip
> WRT54G_Reformed_B8_Alchemy_5_2_2_by_wrt54g.streamfire.net.zip
> Firmware_Alchemy-pre5.2.2.src.by.wrt54g.streamfire.net.bz2
> WRT54G.Sveasoft.Firmware.Alchemy.pre5.1 by wrt54g.streamfire.net.zip
> Firmware_Alchemy-pre5.1.src.by.wrt54g.streamfire.net.tar.bz2
> 
>  
> The web site is also used to disseminate information on where to obtain 
> our copyrighted software from other web sites and is a distribution 
> center used to promote unlawful use of our copyrighted material.
>  
> I state under penalty of perjury that the above is true and correct and 
> that I am the CEO of Sveasoft Inc. and have the right to enforce 
> copyright violations for the company.
>  
> Sveasoft Inc. contact information:
>  
> US Office
>  
> Sveasoft Inc.
> 801 Bristol Ave.
> Stockton, CA 95204
> USA
>  
> European Office
> Myrvagen 3
> SE-134 63 Ingaro
> Sweden
>  
> Tel. 011-468-570-29471
>  
> Electronic Signature:
>  
> /James Ewing/
> James Ewing
>  
> Thanks very much for your help in this,
>  
> James Ewing, CEO
> Sveasoft Inc.
>  
> -------------------------------------
> This message contains confidential information intended only for the 
> individual or individuals named in the email address of the original 
> message. Distribution of this information to other persons without 
> permission of the original author is prohibited.
